DOC.brief_summary: Accelerated rehabilitation protocol in Total Hip Arthroplasty (THA-AR).
DOC.detailed_description: The accelerated rehabilitation protocol in Total Hip Arthroplasty (THA-AR) was designed to improve the functionality and optimize early discharge of patients undergoing THA surgery. This study compared physical therapy protocol in Total Hip Arthroplasty (THA-PT) already deployed in Porto Alegre Clinical Hospital with THA-AR.
